creator: Smartcore Enterprise
descriptionHtml: Kisomo App is designed to deliver interactive, visual and local relevant digital learning content for secondary school students across East Africa. The created content is in the form of Real Life Videos, Visual Graphics, 3D Animations, and Special Visual Effects, Audio Narration / Voice-over combined to make High Definitions and interactive motion pictures.
descriptionShort: We make learning FUN and ENGAGING with 100% Local Visual Content in Videos.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Kisomo now has some FREE COURSES which you can take a look at for free without having to subscribe to any membership. What you need is your Kisomo Account and you are ready to go.
More courses are now available and improvement in content loading speed.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: All new Kisomo App with numerous new features including Kisomo Schools, where schools and institutions can now host their content in Kisomo App. Content may including video content, notes, quizzes, news etc. In app navigation made easy and learning steps simplified.
